replies.body: She is a minor!!!

Seriously asking, was not around here when she was announced and know little about her:
Is her age confirmed, like, at all?

She seems to be either a vastaya or vastayashai'rei, both known for being magical and most likely having long life spans just like yordles.
I thought she would be another "Zoe case", that she looks pretty young, but in reality is a few hundred years old.

I know this is memes and games, but I would like if someone could enlighten me about her here.
Her age was confirmed that she's over 100 years old but is only at the level of maturity of a late teen.

> [{quoted}](name=Thegreatxiu,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HghNQetw,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2018-11-22T18:10:15.560+0000)
>
> Her age was confirmed that she's over 100 years old but is only at the level of maturity of a late teen.

"All characters in this game are over 18 years old."
Ekko Taliyah Akali Ezreal Lux Annie Nunu

That was a reference to the disclaimer seen in a number of productions that could otherwise be deemed illegal. If it looks like a child, acts like a child, is called a child, refers to itself as a child, but producer tells you it's old, then it's old.
Ahhh my bad.
Always happy to learn about the game's characters.
Except Annie, and I think Taliya.
Ekko?
Source? Also never been a fan of the mindset of living a long time but having the mentality of a child.
According to her lore and VO, her tribe was directly descended from the vastayashai'rei - no human blood or genes.  And I heard she's teenager age (16-19), but can't remember where that was.

> [{quoted}](name=BladeSingularity,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HghNQetw,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-11-22T16:43:23.424+0000)
>
> According to her lore and VO, her tribe was directly descended from the vastayashai'rei - no human blood or genes.  And I heard she's teenager age (16-19), but can't remember where that was.

18-20
She was stated to be a teenager.

Can you provide a source?
Because I kinda get contradicting information here, some people say she is hundreds of years old with the mindset of a late teen, and others, like you, say she actually is a teenager.
techically not. Vastaya age different so she may seem like 16, but she is really much older. Same with Rakan and Xayah, they look in their 20s, but they are actualy really, really old.

Their lifespan may be different but time is the same. Just because someone looks younger than they are doesn't change the amount of time they have been alive. If I was born 20 years ago but look like I'm 3, I am still 20 years old.

> [{quoted}](name=Stupafly,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HghNQetw,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2018-11-22T17:39:10.776+0000)
>
> Their lifespan may be different but time is the same. Just because someone looks younger than they are doesn't change the amount of time they have been alive. If I was born 20 years ago but look like I'm 3, I am still 20 years old.

nope. It's the mind that determines the age. If I was born 60 years ago and I act like I am a kid... guess what.
Toure a childish 60 year old.
Like the elves they became of age at like 100-200 years.

> [{quoted}](name=MonarchVis,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HghNQetw,comment-id=00020003,timestamp=2018-11-22T21:20:47.207+0000)
>
> She have an elastic throat...
> 
> ...to sing!
> {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Oh def, TO SING, YEESSSS!
She is also NOT INTO MEN.

So?
People will still make lewds of her involving men. xD

No she is not (I hope)

We will see, I guess.
This won't get deleted.

I have researched the topic of lewd images on boards. This is perfectly fine.
Has no nips or slits, it's within boards guidelines
delet this

I expected a Nico Nico meme.

http://pm1.narvii.com/6288/5e3e3073467a8c9bffaf235be186d67c0cceb659_00.jpg

You disappoint me.
Nico Nico REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!

sry...

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Absolutely Wrryyyyy-diculous.

I Dion't believe it.

She is changing a part of her to copy the frog... 
her passive basically
She can even become the kermit if she wanted to
I think it is a very usefull passive.

I think she is canonically 200 years old. 

But seriously, at this point Riot needs to explain us how the hell the vastaya's biological cicle works. 

I understand that you can be 200 years old and still childish, ok, let's accept that. But how in the world can you be 200 years old and be surprised and excited when you see a frog?!

Biological cycles should differ from vastaya to vastaya as many are very different. One of amphibian traits would differ biologically from one of aves traits. However, they all live long lives and some are said to be immortal, due to their spiritual connections. Neeko was likely very reclusive, mentally stunted someways, or not "awake"(hibernation or something else preventing her from experiencing anything) and so she hasn't properly developed. My guess is that she's mentally challenged like Ivern.

You can go 200 years without seeing a frog, due to what I said above about her never interacting, or simply because Runetarra is so vast and different, many regions likely lack frogs. It's the same way that you would never know about squids or whales if we didn't have the internet, it's not like you see them in everyday life or ever unless you're a fishermen.

Well, if the place she is coming from actually doesn't have any frogs, very well possible to be surprised and excited.
Imagine seeing that animal for the very first time in your life. Runeterra is not earth, they don't have the internet to look up all the weird creatures living all over the world like we do.

Seeing a completely new animal you never even know it exists can be pretty exciting then. Doesn't matter how old you are.
Don't you need a frog for her to get that?
Normally, it's skill based.
O H W E L L
